來吧 支持阿仙奴

有了上帝的恩典，我們答應您的大部分豐富材料已經完成，並將於今年下半年出版，以使對新聞業特別是體育運動感興趣和充滿熱情的人們可以使用。

文章#ArsenalBell涵蓋了最小的細節，從搜索源開始到結束

replies.msg:
With the grace of God, most of the enriching material that we promised you has been prepared and will be published in the second half of this year, to be accessible to those who are interested and passionate about journalism, especially sports.

The article #ArsenalBall covers the smallest details, from searching for the source to writing the news, wait for us.
